reviews.review: สนุกดีครับ แนะนำ รอซื้อช่วงเทศกาลถูกมาก DLC ลดราคาก็ถูกครับ แต่เกมราคาเต็ม 300 บัค 3,000,000 ครับ 555 หยอกๆ

Solo compren el juego si esta en oferta. Y si tienen mínimo, tres compañeros. Los asesinos tienen demasiada ventaja y llega a ser frustrante porque uno pierde injustamente. Ademas de que tiene varios bugs.

처음엔 단순 공포 그리고 고인물 게임으로 접해서 가볍게 즐기고 안건드렸지만 기묘한이야기 콜라보로 다시 시작해서 플탐 1000시간을 찍어버렷다 이겜은 확실히 한번더 그리고 충분히 많은 시간을 녹여내도될만큼의 깊이와 재미가 있다. 그리고 이게임은 매판마다의 심리전과 어그로를 휼륭하게 해냈을때의 그 쾌감은 다른 게임에서는 찾아볼 수 없는 큰 재미가 있다 삿다가 안하는분들 다시 한번 더 이겜을 플레이 해보길 권한다 나처럼 푹빠져서 할 게임이 될지도 모르니 말이다 다만 흠이 있다면 버그가 많다 특히 데드하드 버그는 제발 고쳐주길 바란다

cool game, pig is fun killer :)

Довольно интересный проект от Behaviour Digital Inc. Первый в своем роде. Начну пожалуй с плюсов игры:
1. Атмосфера, музыкальное составляющее, жуткие звуки, мрачные локации; все это держит игрока в напряжении. Даже отыграв в эту игру более 500 часов, я получаю порцию адреналина заходя поиграть в данный онлайн хоррор.
2. Персонажи. Я сейчас буду говорить исключительно о маньяках, так как они являются украшением игры. Все как на подбор, жуткие твари, проработанные до мельчайших подробностей, а это дыхание в меню при выборе персонажа (особенно у "медсестры"). Все они жуткие, и если они гонятся за вами, это вызывает непередаваемые эмоции.


3. Техническая составляющая игры. Игра не привередлива в машине на которой вы ее запустите, даже интернет не так сильно влияет на ваш успех.
4. Геймплей за выживших. Да, здесь я пожалуй начну говорить более конкретно. Игра за выжившего, как я написал выше, дарит вам непередаваемые эмоции, первые часы игры, вам даже страшно, вы просто начинаете прятаться, боясь всего окружающего. Но и наиграв много часов, игра награждает вас эмоциями (уж поверьте).
5. Возможность играть с друзьями. Тут пожалуй описывать нечего )))

This game is a very fun game to play with friends, or just single player. It is stressful in some situations but it is a very fun way to waste time and get in some good fun hours instead of doing nothing bored on the couch. I have only played the role of survivor though, but there is a hunter that you could play and that is just as fun in my opinion.
DBD more like dead by daylight
buena para pasar el rato con amigos. Los sustos son buenos
This game is pretty fun but like in the worst possible way. I don't know.

DBD is kind of like pizza with pineapple. Some people love it, some people can take the pineapple off or tolerate it, and some morbidly hate it enough to scream about it on internet forums. 

A strange combo of pvp rage and strange coincidental shenanigans that  blend together into a weird mess of bugs, sweat, and pure luck. This is not for everyone. For every fun game you have, you will have probably 1 extremely bad one and 5 that are just frustrating. If you're not playing with friends, it's going to raise the frustration number through the roof.

I feel a lot of people forget it's not a win or lose game; it's a points play. You can die in a match and still progress, if and only if, you did enough. It's like tic tac toe, no one should really "win" in an optimal game. Two should die, two should live.  There's no way to communicate with survivors or killers, so your means of interaction is pointing, waving, and rapidly vibrating t-bags. If all goes well, everyone walks out happy, even if they die or not. If not? Well, expect the same amount of salt from a sweaty teenager playing COD. 

Examples of good: 
-a demogorgon who did rapid spins holding his power, letting us boop the snoot 
- a giant yellow bunny legion who let the last man go through the hatch
- a trickster who followed practiced their aim on the exit game lights
- a fair huntress who killed everyone fair and square and was friendly at the end
- a clown that body blocked to make one survivor sit in the corner 
- A higher rank player recognizing someone is a newbie, and letting them learn

Examples of bad:
- a salty Michael who called us dumb b*tches, even with the best add ons only killed 1 person
- face camping and excessive tunneling 
- being called racial slurs or entitled for wanting to do to a glyph challenge
- stunlocking and flashlight spamming to prevent gameplay
- bugs preventing the correct actions from happening

Overall, I enjoy it. I get my money's worth out of it. It's a good game for short bursts between phonecalls as the matches are typically short. DBD has a  lot of meme potential for the competitive and  enough skill level to make people take it personally.
this game sucks but I like it
真tm好玩，除了被永一麦叔吓出心脏病
Needs around $160 spent on dlcs so you can get meta perks on both killer and survivor. Also it just isnt fun after like 5 matches and playing solo survivor is the worst thing on the planet.

I enjoy the concept of the game, and I can appreciate how its executed here, however, there are severe balancing issues mostly regarding the match making system. Playing the game is pretty balanced until about 6 PM. Then you'll get matches of survivors all from a different rank bracket vs a rank 1 killer, or the reverse end of a rank 18-20 killer playing against a 4-stack of rank 1-4 survivors. 

The match making needs a lot of tuning, otherwise, its a pretty solid game!

Game has devolved into mindless rambling where the devs have schizo fits and every surv perk is a power creep on the previous one whereas killer perks are just worse versions of old perks which makes the game so boring for those looking to pick up the game as a killer.

This game is probably one of my favorites. I come home always looking forward to playing with friends or even on my own, I highly recommend this to the people who love horror franchises. This game features a ton of licensed characters from all different franchises. I love how fun it is you can play survivor or killer.

Highly recommended

This game is quite awesome, I have now a little more than 100 hours of game and it still has its surprises and new things to learn, adapt and combine. And I almost never played the assassin role yet, so there is a LOT to explore and expand. I'm definitely going to buy the other expansions eventually but so far I'm pretty happy with the ones I have: Stranger things, Saw and Ash vs Evil Dead.

SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY!

I honestly only been playing for few months and I love this game! As a huge horror fan, seeing killers that I recognize is soo satisfying! I definitely recommend it.  It might be bit difficult at first for survivors or killers but my advice practice, practice! you'll get a hang of it c: and most importantly please do enjoy the game.

This was always a game that I had no interest in playing but I was glad existed. I thought it made great use of the medium of video games. One bored 3 day weekend later and I have 30 hours. 

Being a-symetrical, its a naturally difficult game to balance but its done quite well. Both the killer and the survivors have equal chance of being in control of the match.

If you liked Evolve, like classic horror movies, or like games with high skill caps to sink your teeth into, give it a try.
You'll have more fun gouging your eyes out than playing shit piece of horse shit.
I think we did a pretty good...job so far

Dejen qué cada uno juegue el juego come quiere, soy survi y soy killer y entiendo ambas perspectivas de juego, da bronca cuando te "tunelea" o te "campea" pero despues de todo, es decision del killer la forma de jugar, es MI (siendo killer) juego y no tengo porque seguir ninguna regla y que te llamen manco o que no sabes jugar por seguír una sola manera de jugarlo para que los survis no se ofendan no va de la mano con lo que el juego ofrece. aparte de, como la mayoria de nosotros (siendo survis) utilizamos discord y eso da total ventaja sobre el killer, en fín, la hipotenuza. Esta re bueno el juego, jugalo o no lo juegues. hace lo que quieras, no me importa, no rompan las bolas y rianse cuando les hacen lo que hacemos cuando somos killers. salu2

Only start playing this game if you have infinite free time. The amount of grind is insane. You need to separately unlock perks on each character you want to play. It takes a lot of time, the perks are unlocked more or less randomly and only a few are actually viable.
Many bugs are in the game for more than a year now.
The devs are very slow with making changes to better balance the game or to reduce the grind.

MUITO BOM, PODE COMPRAR
VAI QUE É TUA

as a casual player (never goes below 17) i find the game really fun to play with friends! only /just/ started getting interested in the specifics of what perks do and it's a lot easier than i'd originally imagined (hence why i just didnt bother previously) so in my opinion, casual or competitive the game can be enjoyed by everyone

Good game, very unique.  There isn't another gaming experience quite like it, and that's the problem.  The devs know they have no competition so they're lazy.  Choosing instead to design new art instead of fixing the myriad of balance, glitch, cheats, and netcode issues.  I will change this to a positive review, however, if:

They remove penalty timers for leaving a match.  In this game a match can easily be determined to be a waste of time due to often having to play against the game's glitches + the killer + teammates screwing you over for their own benefit.  Not to mention getting the same penalty if the game or your internet crashes, which is beyond your control.  You're already penalized by forfeiting points, items, and rank.  Being penalized with real world time is unnecesary.

This is the type of game where the outcome can work out a couple of ways, sometime all survivors gets hooked, sometimes only one or two, sometimes none. You don't go into this game expecting a clean sheet every game, if you can do this you will have lots of fun.
